json_schema.reasoning: This schema is designed to represent the structure of credit card data as depicted in the provided images. It includes fields for card type, card number, expiration date, and cardholder name.
json_schema.title: CreditCardSchema

cardType.description: The type of the card, such as Visa Platinum or Visa Electron.

cardNumber.description: The card number displayed on the card.

expirationDate.description: The expiration date of the card.

cardholderName.description: The name of the cardholder as printed on the card.
